articles.title: Julian Alvarez can use Man City clash with Liverpool FC to dispel Erling Haaland myth
articles.description: The Argentina international could face his biggest test to date in a Manchester City shirt
articles.content:
The tour of the United States will have been a positive experience for Julian Alvarez.
He was given plenty of minutes to stretch his legs and get up to speed with his new teammates against both Club America and Bayern Munich. Of course, the Argentine... [2310 chars]

articles.title: Argentina's Fernandez bets on 'superministry' to stop economic bleeding
articles.description: Argentine President Alberto Fernandez launched his latest effort to tackle an economy in crisis on Thursday, tapping one of the ruling coalition's most powerful figures to lead a new "superministry" on the same day the central bank hiked interest rates to 60%.
articles.content: Sergio Massa, President of the Chamber of Deputies, addresses the audience as Argentina's President Alberto Fernandez gestures during an event after midterm elections in Buenos Aires, Argentina, November 14, 2021. REUTERS/Agustin Marcarian/File Photo... [2982 chars]

articles.title: Differences in Healthcare Between the US and Argentina
articles.description: This mom of three moved to Argentina in 2009. Just as they arrived, her son broke his leg, and she paid nothing for his care.
articles.content:
I moved from the suburbs of Michigan to a small town in Argentina in 2009.
My kids at the time were 8, 6, and 4 years old.
My kids and I get the healthcare we need in Argentina, without us going bankrupt.
Over 3 million people read Morning Brew ; you... [3210 chars]

articles.title: UPDATE 1-Argentina's lower house leader Massa named economy 'superminister'
articles.description: Argentina's lower house congressional leader Sergio Massa will take charge of a new economy "superministry," the government said on Thursday, the latest twist in President Alberto Fernandez's struggle to contain a worsening economic crisis.

articles.title: Moderate rains improve wheat prospects in Argentina -grains exchange
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, July 28 (Reuters) - Argentina's wheat planting for the 2022/2023 season has been supported by rainfall in recent days that has helped ease drought conditions in some areas, the Buenos Aires Grains Exchange said on Thursday, a boost for the key farm sector.The exchange maintained its forecast for the wheat planted area at 6.1 million hectares (15 million acres)

articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Argentina's government announced the appointment of an economic “super minister” Thursday, the third economy minister in less than a month as the country struggles with high inflation and a slumping currency.

articles.title: Argentina names economy 'super minister' as crisis deepens
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina (AP) — Argentina's government announced the appointment of an economic “super minister” Thursday, the third economy minister in less than a month as the country struggles with high inflation and a slumping currency.
articles.content:
